attr.title: ROMs Downloader
attr.desc: A tool to download ROM collections from custom indexes. Browse, search, and download files with parallel downloads, background support, and auto-extraction. Features boxart fetching, favorites management, and in-library detection. REQUIRES: System OpenGL/Mesa libraries (libepoxy, libGL). May not work on all devices.
attr.inst: IMPORTANT: This requires OpenGL support. If it crashes immediately, your device may not have the required libraries. Launch the app and configure your custom indexes via the settings menu. Check /storage/roms/ports/roms_downloader/log.txt if it fails to start.
